name: nytimes
text: RT @charlie_savage: BREAKING: Undercutting WH claims that Trump was never briefed on suspected Russian bounty operation & info was not solid enough to tell him about, it was in his written briefing (PDB) 4 months ago - likely Feb 27 - & was circulated broadly in IC on May 4. https://t.co/jYVpakegkZ

name: nytimes
text:
RT @nytchinese: 中国通过港版国安法，赋予当局打击反对北京势力的权力，这可能会加深中国与西方政府的裂痕。据北京的高级香港政策顾问刘兆佳和港媒报道，北京的人大代表已投票一致通过了香港国家安全法。
法案自审议到通过不足两周，凸显了北京在香港实施更全面控制的迫切决心。https://t.co/UScRyh7WfV
